resources.string: Tip 1. Discipline is key, set a time everyday to study and lock that time to only studying, make it a habit/
Tip 2. Revise Revise Revise, keep up to date by reviewing with newly learned concepts and stay on top with your homework.
Tip 3. Have daily objectives and long term dreams, short term goals keep you motivated and long dreams remind you why you are working this hard!
Tip 4. Keep your distractions away, use your phone only to study and other distractions far away from you, this will increase you workflow tremendously.
Tip 5. Take advantage of your resources, if you are struggling, find help! We are here to help you with your questions!
